src/content/guide/it/30012024_Vino_san_v.author: Enovitae Staff
src/content/guide/it/30012024_Vino_san_v.description: "San Valentino è la festa degli innamorati, ma anche dell'amore per il vino. Se vuoi rendere la tua serata romantica ancora più speciale, devi sapere come scegliere il vino giusto per accompagnare la cena, il dolce e il brindisi finale. In questo articolo, ti daremo alcuni consigli su come scegliere il vino per san valentino, in base al menu, al gusto e al budget."

src/content/academy/en/26012024_AI_winem.title: AI and Winemakers: how advanced technology can aid in the vineyard
src/content/academy/en/26012024_AI_winem.author: Enovitae Staff
src/content/academy/en/26012024_AI_winem.description: "Exploring the intersection of artificial intelligence (AI) and viticulture, we delve into how cutting-edge technology is transforming vineyard management. From precision agriculture to climate predictions, AI is proving to be a valuable ally for winemakers in cultivating exceptional grape harvests."

src/content/academy/en/29012024_Bottles_.title: Uncorking the mystery of wine bottles: types, differences, and more
src/content/academy/en/29012024_Bottles_.author: Enovitae Staff
src/content/academy/en/29012024_Bottles_.description: "Wine bottles come in various shapes, sizes, and materials. But have you ever wondered why? Discover the fascinating story behind wine packaging and learn how to choose the perfect bottle for your next dinner party."

src/content/academy/en/26012024_Influenc.description: "In the ever-evolving world of wine, influencers are shaping trends and redefining the way we experience and appreciate this ancient elixir. Let's delve into the rise of wine influencers, exploring their impact on the industry, their unique perspectives, and how they connect with diverse audiences..."

src/content/academy/en/26012024_AI_vino_.title: AI in the wine world: replacement or integration of sommeliers?

src/content/academy/en/26012024_AI_vino_.description: "With the rapid advances of artificial intelligence (AI), the question arises: can AI replace the role of a sommelier? We explore the relationship between technology and tradition in the wine world, evaluating the advantages and challenges of integrating AI into the wine experience."

src/content/academy/en/26012024_Zucchero.title: Sugar in wine: sweetness and complexity in the glass

src/content/academy/en/26012024_Zucchero.description: "Sugar in wine is not just about sweetness but a key element that influences the complexity and character of this age-old beverage. src/content/academy/it/26012024_Influenc.author: Staff Enovitae

src/content/academy/it/27072023_Posso_te.description: "La corretta conservazione del vino è essenziale per garantire che mantenga la sua qualità, sapore e caratteristiche nel tempo."

src/content/academy/it/26012024_AI_winem.author: Staff Enovitae
src/content/academy/it/26012024_AI_winem.description: "Esplorando l'intersezione tra intelligenza artificiale (IA) e viticoltura, approfondiamo come la tecnologia all'avanguardia sta trasformando la gestione dei vigneti. Dall'agricoltura di precisione alle previsioni climatiche, l'IA si sta rivelando un prezioso alleato per i produttori di vino nel coltivare raccolti eccezionali di uva."
